name: R-Genex Turing
text: During your opponent's Main Phase, if you control a "Genex" monster (Quick Effect): You can Special Summon this card from your hand, then, immediately after this effect resolves, you can Synchro Summon 1 "Genex" Synchro Monster. You can only use this effect of "R-Genex Turing" once per turn. This card on the field can be treated as a Level 1 or 3 monster when used for a Synchro Summon of a "Genex" Synchro Monster.
